## Summary

What would you like to build or improve?

## Use case

Who benefits from this change and why?

## Proposed solution

Sketch the API or UX you imagine. If you have a PR in mind, link to relevant files.

## Alternatives considered

What else did you try, and why wasn't it sufficient?

## Additional context

Links, mockups, or reference repos.
